title: Remote Session Performance Statistics
author: mikelee-nz
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
It would be great to be able to see ping/trace and detailed session stats for remote sessions.  For example if I RDP to a machine I could then see the actual performance stats from the client perspective.  It is very hard when we get queries saying performance is bad to isolate remote clients and their associated networks when we can see actual server performance is reported as fine.

iterations.description: Issue has no description or details about what specific performance statistics are desired, how they should be collected, displayed, or what protocols they apply to

notes:
AI triage: Issue has no description or details about what specific performance statistics are desired, how they should be collected, displayed, or what protocols they apply to
Approach: Need clarification from reporter on what metrics to track (latency, bandwidth, session duration, etc.), which protocols, and desired UI before implementation can be planned
